Description: This web service searches for ExplanationOfBenefit resources that meet the specified criteria. ExplanationOfBenefit resources represent claims data received and processed by health plans, including services rendered to a patient and the cost information associated with those services.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: The patient for whom claims data is being retrieved.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

ExplanationOfBenefit.Name: ExplanationOfBenefit
ExplanationOfBenefit.Description: An instance of the R4 ExplanationOfBenefit resource.

careTeam.Name: careTeam
careTeam.Description: The members of the team who provided the products and services.

provider.Name: provider
provider.Description: One of the providers for the claim.

role.Name: role
role.Description: The provider function within the team.

created.Name: created
created.Description: Date when the claim was created.

diagnosis.Name: diagnosis
diagnosis.Description: Each diagnosis on the claim will have an entry. Rx claims do not support diagnosis.

diagnosisCodeableConcept.Name: diagnosisCodeableConcept
diagnosisCodeableConcept.Description: Code set and reference code from the diagnosis.

packageCode.Name: packageCode
packageCode.Description: The diagnosis related group code set and reference code.

disposition.Name: disposition
disposition.Description: Description of the status of the adjudication.

productOrService.Name: productOrService
productOrService.Description: CPT/HCPCS codes or group code. NDC code for Rx claims.

servicedPeriod.Name: servicedPeriod
servicedPeriod.Description: The period of time over which the service is relevant.

outcome.Name: outcome
outcome.Description:
Non-AP Claims: complete

Paid AP claims: complete

Claim in the status of "new": queued (this status is very rare)

All other claims: partial

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: The patient associated with the claim.

procedureCodeableConcept.Name: procedureCodeableConcept
procedureCodeableConcept.Description: ICD procedure code set and reference code.

provider.Name: provider
provider.Description: Reference to the provider for the claim.

status.Name: status
status.Description: Status of the claim. A status is 'cancelled' if it is a cancelled claim, and all other statuses are 'active'.
